title: Advanced atmospheric pressure CVD of a-Si:H using pure and cyclooctane-diluted trisilane as precursor
content:

Liquid silanes can be used for low-cost, fast deposition of hydrogenated amorphous silicon (a-Si:H) as an alternative to state-of-the-art deposition processes such as plasma enhanced chemical vapor deposition or electron...
